author: Admin
title: Ganesh Shankar Vidhayarthi Park Field House
descripTion: Developed a modern open gym in Ganesh Shankar Vidhayarthi Park by installing multiple outdoor fitness machines such as air walkers, chest press, and leg press. The project promotes community fitness and provides residents of all age groups a safe, accessible place to exercise in the heart of General Ganj.
location: General Ganj, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India

author: Admin
title: Radha Madhav Mandir Park
descripTion: Installed outdoor gym machines including twisters, pull-up bars, and seated pedalers at Radha Madhav Mandir Park. This initiative encourages physical wellness and transforms the park into a lively recreational space for the Kidwai Nagar community.
location: Kidwai Nagar, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India

author: Admin
title: Darshanpura Central Park
descripTion: Equipped Darshanpura Central Park with open-air gym machines such as elliptical trainers, rowing machines, and push-up stations. The project enhances the parkâ€™s usability, turning it into a hub for daily exercise and healthy lifestyle practices in Gumti.

author: Admin
title: Gayatri Park, Barra 3
descripTion: Developed Gayatri Park by installing durable outdoor fitness equipment including leg exercisers, chest expanders, and cycling machines. The initiative creates a vibrant community fitness corner for Janta Nagar residents, encouraging daily physical activity.
location: Janta Nagar, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India

author: Admin
title: Omar Vaish Vidyapeeth
descripTion: Installed a variety of open gym machines at Omar Vaish Vidyapeeth park including cross trainers, sit-up benches, and parallel bars. The project helps students and local residents engage in affordable and healthy outdoor workouts within Shyam Nagar.
location: Shyam Nagar, Sarvottam Enclave, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India

author: Admin
title: Maa Durga Park
descripTion: Revitalized Maa Durga Park by setting up outdoor gym equipment like arm wheel rotators, leg presses, and sit-up boards. The project provides a convenient, eco-friendly fitness option for the residents of Sutar Ganj and Gwaltoli.
location: Sutar Ganj, Gwaltoli, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India

author: Admin
title: Gopal Park
descripTion: Added new open gym equipment to Gopal Park, including push-up bars, air walkers, and cycling stations. This development aims to promote health, fitness, and social well-being in the Gwaltoli community by providing easy access to exercise facilities.

author: Admin
title: School Water Cooler Project
descripTion: Installed high-capacity water coolers in a government school to provide safe and clean drinking water for students and staff. The project ensures health, hygiene, and accessibility to pure water, especially during peak summer months.
